description.displayText:
Cindy had been our nanny from 2009-2014 for my two kids when she started one was she months and the other new born.I had total confidence in her with my babies in their development.She has always displayed a very mature responsible in her actions from house maintenance,kids schedules,to baths dinners,always a smoothness in the way she works.
I totally recommend her to anyone that's looking for loyalty and commitment.

Zoe
description.originalText:

description.displayText:
Hi 
I totally recommend Cindy to anyone that's looking to be a team player and part of their family.She is very proactive and responsible.I have had total confidence in her while I was absent, she just always maintained a stable safe environment for my kids.Her temperament has been the same with my 2 boys throughout the years 2014-2018.We are however very sad to loose to her since we are relocating end of this July.
I definitely recommend her to anyone that's looking for reliable,hardworking and honest individual.Please call me anytime if you need to know more about her.
Shira

description.displayText: Cindy is a wonderful nanny and a great person. She watched my daughter from the day we brought her home from the hospital until she was 18 months old and we moved out of the area. She then took care of a close friends kids until she moved. I absolutely love Cindy, she has a very even temper and a friendly way about her and is very trustworthy and responsible. I couldn't say enough good things about her
